TopicTitle: Cannot place maneuver node when I have an encounter

Articles.Content:
I am in solar orbit and I have a Duna encounter. Great. Except I cannot place a kod damn maneuver node on the blue orbital line, it only wants to be placed on the purple line.

 Anyone know how to avoid this BS?

OK this seems to be a known bug and I found a solution. Place a node on the purple line and then grab it and move it to the blue line. Phew.

 So folks if you have that issue that is the fix. lol. Oh KSP how I hate love you..
